name: Gun Funk
description:
Ever wanted to *actually* dodge bullets in slow motion? Now you can! What about shooting down some crazy looking enemies "Akimbo style" while doing flips in the air? Great!

Gun Funk is a stylish single-player 3rd person shooter game for PC, in which the player can slow down time. This allows you to dodge attacks, while trying to shoot down enemies and other targets. The game also features an original soundtrack.

Try out the demo!

The demo version includes 6 playable levels, and 3 cosmetic items you can unlock by completing extra challenges. 

The full version of the game is planned to have between 40-60 levels, with 10 or more unique boss fights, and plenty of fun cosmetic items to unlock! The amount of content depends on the funding raised.

The game is starting Kickstarter fundraising on the 15th of August 2022. If you like the game idea and want to see the full version get released, please consider supporting.

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gunfunk/gun-funk
